name: catachresis
text: The strange... Italy thing in the frame is definitely the worst item ever.

name: prius_chaser
text: But...it's from Milan

name: whuppins
text: Right; you know it went for like $2500.

name: rotating-dog
text: I see strange "art" like this in places such as the dentist or an unused spare room

name: cailetshadow
text: Some things are destined for the back wall of Goodwill the moment they are born.

name: zem
text: The best fake name the prison pen pal can come up with is Samuel Ademis

name: tekende
text: Samuel Ademis: Always a good decision.

name: hellofyellin
text: If any place needs some more laser hair, it's Hollywood.

name: feetnotes
text: Let me get one thing clear. I love you.

name: epicurus
text: Also note that the prison pen pal typed each paragraph at different times since they don't line up. Presumably they typed the whole letter and only added the "Dear Ray," right before their sent it.

name: snowman
text: God, you're right.  That's really weird.

name: epicurus
text: So I think we all agree that the bottom right "Italy' is Winter, and the bottom left one is Spring, but then which of the remaining two are summer and fall?

name: chrissketch
text:
I assumed bottom left was fall. So the top left and top right ones are, to me, spring and summer, respectively.

Aw dammit, I stared at it too long. Now the word Italy has lost its meaning and just looks weird now.

name: tekende
text: I think the one with the exclamation point is summer. Top left is fall because it is in italics and is therefore somewhat serious , much like the season.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by karljw, aliiis, aparrish)

name: tbtabby
text: The untold origin of Miami.

name: drago25
text: I love this strip but hate it at the same time 'cause the name Samuel Ademis really made me want a stone-cold Samuel Adams, but there are NONE n' I'm all snowed in like. Feck.

name: achilleselbow
text: If Samuel Adams is your landlord, you may have a drinking problem.

name: drago25
text: But he's so good to me. And crispy.

name: tekende
text:
Samuel Adams

Tuck me in and be my landlord

name: theguitarhero
text:
I'll pay my rent everyday I promise Samuel.

No don't evict me oh god my life.

name: rowboat
text: Everyone knows Ray hates pen pals.

name: achilleselbow
text: I did not know this, but I do now.

name: i_love_kate
text: It is pretty basic.

name: direhaggis
text: Panel 3 makes perfect sense. You know that Ray bought the Four Seasons print in a drunken fit of loving fonts. Man hell of loves fonts .

name: heccibiggs
text: Ugh, I can't stand looking at that damn Italy thing. I'm a graphic design student (very early in the process) and already it has been ingrained in me that you NEVER use more than two different fonts on anything. Because it looks Godfuckingawful.

name: alzuna
text:
I also am a graphic design student (I don't know where the hell I am exactly in the process...) and that third choice of typeface is an Abomination.

Also the first one looks like Lucida Handwriting or something, which reminds me of church bulletin board announcements and that is not a good thing.

name: yearsinhotclaws
text:
This uses three and it looks awesome.

[IMGS OFF]

name: meddle
text: hell yeah the breeders
